Owen Trotter is a chartered accountant with over 12 yearsâ€™ experience of private equity investing in both Europe and North America. Owen spent five years with Granville Baird (now Baird Capital Partners), firstly in the UK and then in Germany. More recently. Owen was a partner in the Mezzanine Fund of the Royal Bank of Canada, based in Toronto. During that time, he held a number of non-executive directorships.

Owen lives in Shropshire with his wife and their dog. He is a keen squash player and a long suffering supporter of Lincoln City FC.
